name: entremets
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a dessert (= sweet food eaten at the end of a meal): Next, I had to prepare a white chocolate entremets. This thin sponge cake is primarily used in entremets.
a small dish that is served between the main dish and a sweet dish, especially at a formal meal: The entremets, the dessert, and the cheeses were all ready. Serve this dish as a vegetable entremets.
More examplesFewer examplesSweet entremets are usually served towards the end of a meal.Any fish served as entremets should be small.Serve the asparagus hot for entremets.
